channel.title: Client help urgent!
channel.description: I keep getting this error with every server i try to run with my client can someone help? please?? thanks.. [CODE]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.GOP(client.java:9442) at client.method126(client.java:9589) at client.method112(client.java:8841) at client.method146(client.java:12052) at client.method102(client.java:7756) at client.method9(client.java:8641) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:129) at client.run(client.java:4433) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/CODE]

item.title: Client help urgent!
